name: sb-event-kit
description: A library for creating disposable components

scripts.dist-standalone: browserify lib/main.js --standalone EventKit | babel --presets es2015 | uglifyjs > eventkit-bundle.min.js
scripts.dist: npm run dist-standalone ; npm run dist-library ; git add eventkit-*.js ; git commit -m ':arrow_up: Upgrade dist file'

author: steelbrain
